work.heading: UpCycle
work.description: UpCycle is a collaborative web project that documents the learning of TidalCycles (a music programming language made for live-coding). Features: P5.js (with P5 Sound) for audio playback and visualiser, RegEx for syntax highlighting, HTML/CSS/JavaScript.

work.heading: MultiMono
work.description: Multimono.space is a web implementation of Jesse Austin-Stewarts installation multiple monophony, a framework for non-sweet-spot spatial composition. Speaker positions are randomised on each listen. Features: binaural rendering, three.js. 12XMONO composition created with live-coding techniques using tidalcycles and a custom panner created in Max/MSP

work.heading: ComPoser
work.description: ComPoser utilises machine learning technology to control sound with a series of user-generated poses. Features: ML5, PoseNet, P5, HTML/CSS/JavaScript.

work.heading: SocketAV
work.description: SocketAV fuses together different technologies to create an online interactive audio-visual installation. Audience members are able to interact with each other online via visual material on the screen that is mapped from their webcam. Through interaction with the installation, audience members are able to gain small amounts of insight into the real-time experience of other audience members that are at the same time connected. P5 Node SocketIO.

work.heading: String Quartet
work.description: Visual score made in processing for string quartet. Written for and performed by the New Zealand String Quartet.

work.heading: Ambisonic Work
work.description: A stereo rendering of generated audio from my ambisonic manipulation pure data patch. The patch manipulates ambisonic audio files while preserving their spatial qualities.

work.heading: Mesh Audio
work.description: A sound installation exploring mesh network communication. Features: esp32 microcontrollers programmed with C.
